roll.formula: @X ← (if #1 = "Basic" then d20 elif #1 = "Advantage" then 2d20H1 elif #1 = "Disdvantage" then 2d20L1 else 20 end). if @X = 1 then @CRITICAL((@X)) else @SDMG ← (if #2 = "Glaive" then if @X = 20 then (2d10 + @STR + @GLAIVEBONUS) else (d10 + @STR + @GLAIVEBONUS) end elif #2 = "Handaxe" then if @X = 20 then (2d6 + @STR) else (d6 + @STR) end else 0 end). @BDMG ← (if #2 = "Glaive Butt" then if @X = 20 then (2d4 + @STR + @GLAIVEBONUS) else (d4 + @STR + @GLAIVEBONUS) end else 0 end). @PDMG ← (if #2 = "Javelin" then if @X = 20 then (2d6 + @STR) else (d6 + @STR) end else 0 end). @SDMG ← (if #3 = 1 ∧ (#2 = "Glaive" ∨ #2 = "Handaxe") then (@SDMG + @RAGE((@BARBLVL))) else @SDMG end). @PDMG ← (if #3 = 1 ∧ #2 = "Javelin" then (@PDMG + @RAGE((@BARBLVL))) else @PDMG end). @BDMG ← (if #3 = 1 ∧ #2 = "Glaive Butt" then (@BDMG + @RAGE((@BARBLVL))) else @BDMG end). @SDMG ← (if #3 = 1 ∧ (#2 = "Glaive" ∨ #2 = "Handaxe") then if #4 = 1 then if @X = 20 then 4d6 + @SDMG else 2d6 + @SDMG end else @SDMG else @SDMG end). @PDMG ← (if #3 = 1 ∧ #2 = "Javelin" then if #4 = 1 then if @X = 20 then 4d6 + @PDMG else 2d6 + @PDMG end else @PDMG else @PDMG end). @BDMG ← (if #3 = 1 ∧ #2 = "Glaive Butt" then if #4 = 1 then if @X = 20 then 4d6 + @BDMG else 2d6 + @BDMG end else @BDMG else @BDMG end). (if @X = 20 then @CRITICAL((@X)) else @X ← (if #5 = 0 then @X else (@X + Wd4) end). @ATKROLL((#2,@X)) end) + @ATKDMG((@SDMG,@PDMG,@BDMG)) end
